1: NavBar that allows navigating through the site
Contains links to all other pages in site
2: Music player that is serves as a way to navigate to a page
The play button navigates to the site
The next and previous buttons chaneg which site is shown on the music player card
3: About section that has two smaller section
3.1: This section has my information as well as the websites information
3.2: This section has details on how to reach me

name: Essay Page Wireframe
summary: A wireframe for the essay page.

1: An animated text written 'Now Playing: {pages name}' that tells you what page you are on
2: Album/Image art of the essay topic

name: Design Page 1 Wireframe
summary: A wireframe for the first design page.

1: Album cards that contain an image and short description of the card (clickable and shows more info)
2: The album/cover art of that design section topic
3: A short summary of the design section topic to be discussed

name: Art Page Wireframe
summary: A wireframe for the plan of the art page.

1: NavBar that allows navigating through the site
Contains links to all other pages in site
2.1: First WebArt option which is a piano that is connected to the keyboard
The user will be able to play piano keys on their keyboard and possibly make their own melody
2.2: A globe that will show a users music preferences with help of an API as well as logins to their music account
3: A serach bar that allows searching for music artists
4: This info section takes the searched artist from 3 and shows recommended to expand your music taste
